title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.13 - Rehabilitation programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-2.13 - Rehabilitation programs

State Regulations

For an individual employed as part of a rehabilitation
program approved by the commissioner, the payment of compensation under such
program shall be deemed to meet the requirements of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-2.13

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
